testcase.classname: US18 : As a registered user, I want to have a page where I can see my Credit plans and get Credit.
testcase.name: TC12 : The "Installments" button must be visible and active for the running process on the My loans page. Clicking the button verifies that the "Loan Installments" page is accessible

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: * The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"..........................passed * Click on the login button.................................................passed * The registered "usernameIsmail" is entered in the Username Or Email box...passed * Registered user "password" is entered in the Your Password box............passed * Click on the login button to log in.......................................passed * Click on the Take Loan button.............................................passed * Click on the basic loan button............................................passed * Click on the Test Loan Apply Now button...................................passed * A number between "5000" and "15000" is entered in the Enter An Amount box.passed * Click on the Confirm button...............................................passed * Click on the Apply button under the Application Form Text.................passed * Click on the arrow sign in the Loan Status box select "running" status from the dropdown menu that opens..passed * Click on the running button...............................................undefined * Verify that the Installment box is visible in the bar that opens..........skipped * Verify that the Installment box is clickable..............................skipped * Click on the Installment box..............................................skipped * Verify that Loan Installments is displayed on the page that opens.........skipped * Close the page............................................................skipped
